title: String
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar = "Variable String">>
Test Line After

title: StringExpression
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar = "Variable String" + " Appended">>
Test Line After

title: Boolean
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar = true>>
Test Line After

title: BooleanExpression
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar = (true || false) && (false || !false)>>
Test Line After

title: Variable
body:
Test Line
<<set $firstvar = "First variable string">><<set $secondvar = $firstvar>>
Test Line After

title: InlineExpression
AssignmentWithFunction
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar to identity(false)>>
Test Line2
<<set $testvar to identity(true)>>

title: AssignmentWithFunction2
body:
Test Line
<<set $testvar to visited("AssignmentWithFunction")>>Test Line2<<jump AssignmentWithFunction>>
